title.narrative: ENABLE II Procurement of Services - Long + Short term consultancies; Technical advice to advocacy groups; Research

description.narrative: This activity (ENABLE II Procurement of Services - Long + Short term consultancies; Technical advice to advocacy groups; Research) is a component of Enhancing Nigerian Advocacy for a better Business Environment II (ENABLE II) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £10,633,475. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development, Trade policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Baker Tilly Nigeria. The start date is 01-04-2014 and the end date is 31-12-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
